    Constructors in primitives with parameters of type Point3D
    Constructor Description
    Ray​(Point3D p0, Vector dir)
    constructor for ray. receives starting point and vector and sets them. sets the vector normalized
    Ray​(Point3D p0, Vector dir, Vector normal)
    constructor for ray.
    Vector​(Point3D head)
    constructor for vector, receive point and sets as head of the vector from (0,0,0) head can't be (0,0,0) - because the vector doesn't exist.
